thread.section_title: Libertel Gare du Nord Suede - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Compact but convenient
thread.title_full: Compact but convenient - Review of Libertel Gare du Nord Suede, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Andrea M
title: Compact but convenient
text: This hotel is extremely convenient for those travelling to or from Gare du Nord. I had a very small room but for one night or when you are spending all day and evening out, this was perfect. The staff are extremely helpful, the location is great and the breakfast was very good.
